DOC.criteria: Women 18 year age old Undergoing speculum examination part regular clinical care Proficient knowledge English language able sign inform consent form Younger 18 year age Women history vulvodynia , vaginismus , dyspareunia No prior sexual activity intercourse Active vaginal , cervical , uterine adnexal infection Active pregnancy within 6 week postpartum Vulvar vaginal surgery within three month Psychiatric condition
